ItemTooltips.branches: Gives some stats and can be upgraded later.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Good if you are against enemies that cast a lot.
ItemTooltips.clarity: More Mana for when you get low.
ItemTooltips.flask: Good heal if you get low.
ItemTooltips.courier: All teams need a courier, if someone else buys it get wards instead.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: A very good item that will keep your team alive. Your team only needs one so if some else gets one buy wards instead.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: A nice aura for the team. Your team only needs one so if some else gets one buy wards instead.
ItemTooltips.flying_courier: Upgrade the courier when you have some extra money, if its already upgraded, buy some wards.
ItemTooltips.pipe: Protects your team against magic. Your team only needs one so if some else gets one buy wards instead.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: Good heal for the team and good stats for you. Your team only needs one so if some else gets one buy wards instead.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: Very powerful item if you can afford it.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: A good upgrade that allows you to defend.
ItemTooltips.refresher: A double ult will make your team very hard to kill.
ItemTooltips.assault: Very good aura for the team.
ItemTooltips.soul_ring: Gives a very nice amount of Mana.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Allows you to have lots of Mana as well as give some to the team.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: A good aura and upgrades form a Bracer if you decide to buy one. Your team only needs one so if some else gets one buy wards instead.
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: Good cheaper alternative to Scythe of Vyse since it can disarm carries.
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots: If you do not need the Mana form Arcane boots get these instead.

AbilityTooltips.omniknight_purification: Very good heal and nuke use it as needed in lane. In team fights use it to keep people alive.
AbilityTooltips.omniknight_repel: Very good spell for keeping people alive, one level has enough duration early on.
AbilityTooltips.omniknight_degen_aura: A nice aura that will keep the enemy form running.
AbilityTooltips.omniknight_guardian_angel: Powerful ultimate, try to save it for team fights to keep everyone alive.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: No need to take this until you have to.
